entries.journal_entry_description: Huff Darklighter has asked me to help his daughter, Dera, with some Tusken Raiders.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Huff's daughter, Dera Darklighter, is somewhere out in the Tatooine Desert. Huff wants you to check on her, and make sure she's all right.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You should speak to Dera Darklighter.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Dera says that you would be a great help to her if you could take care of some vile Tuskens in a nearby cave. The blood hunters and flesh renders are your targets.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Dera says that if you remove the Tusken vile chieftain, it should slow the attacks by the raiders enough that more force can be brought against them.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Dera Darklighter wants you to eliminate some especially vile Tusken Raiders who have established themselves in a nearby cave.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Now that you've taken care of the Tuskens you should go back and speak with Dera again.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Now that you've made sure Dera is all right you should return to Huff and see what else he needs done.
